WorkItem.ClosedComment: Probably not going to happen. Following ModernUI guidelines, icons are not part of menu links.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi.

IMHO a nice UX improvement could be to add icons to the main menu links.
In the attached demo screenshot the icon is the red square.

The icon should be a property of Link class and must be optional.
Thanks.

Diego

Comments.Message:
Ok, I understand.

Thank you for the reply.

Diego.

Can u please provide any demo for Icon with menu

Thanks

Unfortunately we have not implemented this feature. But I believe that it isn't difficult to do. Just subclassing some objects.

Diego.
